channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Judge sets April trial for 3 former officers charged with murder in Tyre Nichols’ beating
item.description: A judge has scheduled a trial for April for three former Memphis police officers charged with murder in the beating of Tyre Nichols.

item.title: Ringo goes country, again. The ex-Beatle mixes peace and love with twang and heartache on new album
item.description: Country music comes naturally to Ringo Starr. The former Beatle has dabbled in the music ever since singing the country hit “Act Naturally” with the Beatles in 1965, and he’s now about to release a whole country album.

item.title: Retail sales up solidly in October as Americans showed continued willingness to spend
item.description: Americans stepped up their spending at retailers last month in the latest sign that healthy consumer spending is driving the economy’s steady growth.
